Tybalt You Ratcatcher

By Jonathan Tang and Ashwin Suresh

Our Thesis Statement and Actors

Thesis Statement

In our adaptation of Act 3 Scene 1 we will emphasize how aligning yourself with one group of people and pledging unquestioned loyalty can remove oneâ€™s rational thought and be self-destructive through the characters actions.
